4ti2.description: 4ti2 is a software suite for algebraic, geometric, and combinatorial problems on linear spaces. It is available on the cluster via a module.

Macaulay2.description: Macaulay2 is a software system for research in algebraic geometry and commutative algebra. It is designed to be easy to use and provides a powerful programming environment. It is particularly well-suited for computations in algebraic geometry, commutative algebra, and related areas.

AFNI (Analysis of Functional NeuroImages.description: AFNI (Analysis of Functional NeuroImages) is a leading software suite of C, Python, R programs and shell scripts primarily developed for the analysis and display of multiple MRI modalities

Alphafold.description: AlphaFold can predict protein structures with atomic accuracy even where no similar structure is known.

Alphafold3.description: AlphaFold can predict protein structures with atomic accuracy even where no similar structure is known.

Ansys Fluent.description: Ansys Fluent is proprietary fluid simulation software

ORCA.description: ORCA is a general-purpose quantum chemistry program package that features virtually all modern electronic structure methods.

Pytorch.description: Provides PyTorch 2.2 with CUDA and cuDNN via NVIDIA NGC container

bohra.homepage: https://github.com/MDU-PHL/bohra) is a microbial genomics pipeline.

zstd.description:
Zstandard is a real-time compression algorithm, providing high compression ratios.
 It offers a very wide range of compression/speed trade-off, while being backed by a very fast decoder.
 It also offers a special mode for small data, called dictionary compression, and can create dictionaries
 from any sample set.

COMSOL.description: COMSOL is a multiphysics solver that provides a unified workflow for electrical, mechanical, fluid, and chemical applications.

claritas.homepage: https://www.petrosys.com.au/claritas) is a proprietary software package for 2D and 3D land and marine seismic data processing.

connectome_workbench.homepage: https://humanconnectome.org/software/get-connectome-workbench) is an open-source visualization and discovery tool used to explore data generated by the Human Connectome Project.

deepposekit.homepage: https://github.com/jgraving/DeepPoseKit) is a Python toolkit with a high-level API for 2D pose estimation of user-defined keypoints using deep learning.

fsl.homepage: https://fsl.fmrib.ox.ac.uk/fsl/fslwiki/) is a library of analysis tools for FMRI, MRI and diffusion brain imaging data.
